short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to change the background color of a page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows users to easily change the background color of any active webpage with a single click. Once installed, simply click the extension icon in the browser toolbar to open a popup with a "Change Background" button. Clicking the button applies a random background color to the current page, providing a fun, customizable browsing experience
